ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables

TOKEN.description: Your bot token, that can be created using @BotFather

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks in env mode messages

URL.description: The heroku app url similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: optional: a chat where your replied messages are stored, to stop people spamming
